scripts.inst:all: bun install && cd server && bun install && cd ../client && bun install
scripts.build:server: cd server && cross-env MODE_ENV=production bun run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && cross-env MODE_ENV=production bun run build
scripts.build: bun run build:server && bun run build:client
scripts.serve: cd server && cross-env MODE_ENV=production bun run ./dist/index.js
scripts.clean:dist: npx rimraf ./server/node_modules && npx rimraf ./client/node_modules && npx rimraf ./node_modules"
